name: Targus AMU83US Wired Optical Mouse
Features: The Targus Mini Kaleidoscope Retractable Mouse is a fun and functional optical mouse. When powered, the mouse radiates seven continuous colors to brighten up your workspace. Colors are visible through the translucent scroll wheel and also show through the side and bottom of the mouse. Customizable color settings allow the user select one of seven colors or cycle through all of the colors during use. The optical technology provides accurate and precise mouse movements while the scroll wheel makes it easy to navigate through web pages and spreadsheets. The USB cable retracts creating a small form factor for travel and allows users to adjust the cable length. The ergonomic design is both comfortable and ambidextrous making it easy to use whether you are left or right handed.
